ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup butter, cut into pieces, 2  eggs,   +   1/2 cup milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract,   +   1/2 teaspoon almond extract,   +   3/4 cup flaked coconut
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 7g 34%, Cholesterol 36mg 12%, Sodium 133mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 17g 6%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 9g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 0mg 1%, Calcium 24mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 43mg 1%
